name: Ispolink
intro: The Job Search Engine of The Metaverse
introduce: Ispolink connects crypto firms, Metaverse projects, Gaming companies, DeFi businesses and NFT projects with the talents they need. To make this possible, Ispolink offers a comprehensive end-to-end solution that empowers business with a full set of tools to navigate the entire selection process flawlessly and source talents in a blink of an eye.
